review:
I am very happy to write this review about Dr. Samatha and Birth Place hospital even when l am busy in taking care of my little princess. I hope this would help someone to find a good doctor and a good hospital....

It has been more than 11 months that the doctor and her wonderful team at Birth Place Hospital brilliantly delivered my baby (it was NVD) ...and now Iam surprised to witness the fact that Dr Samatha still recognizes me. 

We went for our baby's routine checkup with a pediatrician at Birth Place Hospital, Gatchibowli .. and Dr Samatha didnot hesitate to come and have a talk with me and my husband to know about my daughter's well abouts when she saw us waiting there.

This shows how much the doctor is dedicated and committed towards her profession and patients. *********** *** ******* ** *** **** ****** ** ** ********** if you are some like me going through the process for the first time and have many questions that are bothering for a hassle free delivery. 

And also Birth Place Hospital, it is one of the best hospitals in the city which is well maintained and clean. I am very happy that I could find this hospital in Hyderabad. Really appreciate the management for maintaining the hospital so well and also for hiering doctors like Samatha which makes us feel like being at home.. each and every penny spent is worth spending.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Samatha came as a blessing in our lives. I was skeptical at first, but she made sure that I feel comfortable. She explained us the entire procedure and gave us good set of tips on exercise and meditation, which really worked. She ensured that we are well informed on every aspect of delivery at the right time and helped me calm down my anxiety levels, which are quite common for expectant mothers. She encouraged me to continue work and lead a normal life as she rightly said that - Pregnancy is not a disease, it is a beautiful experience and indeed, it is. I cannot thank her enough for making the whole experience of delivering my son so memorable and least painful with the affection she gave me during the process. In addition, I would like to mention that she takes care of her patient post-delivery and stresses on taking good care of the mother. Lastly, I would definitely advice anyone to go to Birthplace and to Doctor Samatha if you do not want to stress and do not want to bother yourself much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** **** ******* I have severe phobia for hospitals and I was scared of visiting hospitals. But now my perception has changed and I am thrilled to meet Dr. Samatha. This is the level of comfort and warmth she offers to everyone who visits her. When I was going through some pressure for internal scan, she entered the room to help me and I even did not realise when my scan was completed. I just fell in love with her. 
I don’t even think and worry of my labor hours now coz I totally believe that Samatha beside me has nothing to worry about. * **** ***** ******* *********** ** ** ******* *** ***** ************* *** *** ** *** **** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: What I appreciated the most was the doctors patience and how she explained the health condition in detail. She would explain about the progress of my pregnancy, future plan of action and what options I had. Diet exercise and other aspects were also covered in detail. In all it was a good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very poor experience i would say considering that we had taken online appointment to consider birth place to move forward for deleivery but after discussing with her dropped out of it *********** **** **** **** ***** ***** .  So for online appointment she didnt even take the video call even though we insisted couple of times by changing to video but no response then she responded if its audio only call. *** *** *** **** *** ****** ** *** ******* ******* ****** *** ********** ** *** ***** ******** ******** ****** * Anyways call lasted only for 5-10 mins , pointing out to take suggestions from another doctor in birth place again money factor does come into picture paying out to other doctor the consulation fees and again take another appointment after one weeek so that we can pay her as well again .  

****** **** ******** ****** ** *** *** ******* *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Samatha comes across as a very friendly and a warm person. She explains everything in details and is always happy to answer any no. Of questions you may have. In case of any problem, she shows a very positive attitude and assures you that everything will be fine with the right medical advice. Up till now I have had a great experience with her, hope to continue the same in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
While me n my husband planning to have a kid and because of job pressures we were in very much stress.
Doctor Samantha's suggestions helped us to get rid of all pressures. I have conceived in 4months I met her.
We are very happy and lucky to have her as our doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ******* ****** ** **** *** ****** I have never seen such a sweet, humble and friendly doctor.. she is equal to god for me.. Me and my sister both got treated by doctor Samatha and we both just adore her.. words plead inability to prove how much me and my sister admire her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: In simple words I want to explain because I don't have words to express my gratitude toward the angel of The Birth Place Dr. Samatha. She is the finest doctor we the family ever experienced. She is the asset of The Birth Place. Thank you madam you made my wife labour in a highly professional manner with normal delivery. Thank you. Gautham

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was expecting my second child . We had moved from bombay a few years prior. Dr. Samatha was incredible with the support and genuine interest with all my concerns. She was clear in how she explained each stage and my progress throughout the pregnancy.  Even at the hospital during delivery,
I couldn’t have felt more safe with her in charge.  That goes without saying. I must include the rest of the team at the hospital were just as efficient .

I am very happy to write this review about Dr. Samatha and Birth Place hospital even when l am busy in taking care of my little princess. I hope this would help someone to find a good doctor and a good hospital....

It has been more than 11 months that the doctor and her wonderful team at Birth Place Hospital brilliantly delivered my baby (it was NVD) ...and now Iam surprised to witness the fact that Dr Samatha still recognizes me. 

We went for our baby's routine checkup with a pediatrician at Birth Place Hospital, Gatchibowli .. and Dr Samatha didnot hesitate to come and have a talk with me and my husband to know about my daughter's well abouts when she saw us waiting there.

This shows how much the doctor is dedicated and committed towards her profession and patients. *********** *** ******* ** *** **** ****** ** ** ********** if you are some like me going through the process for the first time and have many questions that are bothering for a hassle free delivery. 

And also Birth Place Hospital, it is one of the best hospitals in the city which is well maintained and clean. I am very happy that I could find this hospital in Hyderabad. Really appreciate the management for maintaining the hospital so well and also for hiering doctors like Samatha which makes us feel like being at home.. each and every penny spent is worth spending.

I fall short of words to tell my experience with Dr.Samatha..more than a Doctor she is like a family to me.The way she receives patients with her pleasant smile makes them forget all the pain and discomfort.She is calm,friendly, caring *** *** **** doctor @The Birthplace

She make you feel more comfortable during appointments. You want to feel as though your doctor genuinely cares so that you and your family can share questions or concerns openly,she is the one that is warm and attentive, encouraging their patients to speak openlY.She explain what they are doing and why to put you at ease and make it easier to follow treatments properly.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
*** ******* ***** ** *** ** *** **** ****  *******  ** ********** This doctor did not warn us about precautions , the doctor who took the ultrasound said the baby was fine and nothing to worry. Dr Samatha also said the same thing.
A week later my wife experienced pains and spotting so we tried reaching out to the doctor but she wasn't available during an emergency. So we had to switch hospitals to Rainbow in Hyderabad ***** *** ********** ****** **** *** **** *** * ****** ********* *** ******** ** **** ** **** ****** **** **** ** *********** ***** ** ******* ****** ** ******** ** ********** We lost our baby later the next day. Now the doctor who took the scan said the babies heart beat was weak last time which we weren't informed before. DO NOT CONSULT THIS DOCTOR. We spent around 20 thousand in week for tests alone and my baby wasn't taken care of or my wife. We decided to never visit the hospital again.

Dr Samantha is very professional and caring. It was like speaking with your well wisher. She has very good attitude towards treating her patients. She allows patients to speak first and then she prescribes the treatment and medicines accordingly. I recommend her to all my friends and relatives. Happy to choose her as my doctor .

context: Pregnancy Exercise,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review: The doctor is very sensitive to the health of her patients, very thorough with consultations and generous with information regarding pregnancy, besides she is warm. I hope and pray that she will be available for delivery.  Suggestions recommended have been helpful especially the warm water and honey in the morning. We are very grateful to the team.

Doctor Samatha is a wonderful doctor who did my c section which went very smooth and Recovery was indeed easy, I was up and able to perform my day to day work after just 3 days of rest. She has done a great job on incision as well. My baby is perfectly doing well and Iam so thankful to Doctor on giving right kind of treatments whenever needed, she has been a great support during my pregnancy fears and depression .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She was in extreme hurry 
Just wanted to finish in 2 mins 
Seems absolutely not intrested.
Dint bother to check reports* ************ *** ******** ************ ****** ***** **** ***** ** **** ** **********
Good.Not much satisfied.dint get a chance to spend atleast 10 mins in the room with doctor in all my visits.

There is nothing great about Birthplace, we booked prior appointment at 11am, but we waited till 12 noon, and waited 1 more hour for viability scan, overall our first visit made very bad impression, intact we are planning to change hospital
She is very polite and friendly and explains the diagnosis and treatment plan. I definitely liked her approach.
Left without informing us. Do not go to her. Birthplace didn't even bother to inform us. When go there we were just informed that doctor has left, would never go back.

review: *** ******* ***** * **** ******* I value fact she is a good listener and I am going one step further to also to recommend you as a great human being. Thanks Dr. Samatha.
She is approachable. She made my pregnancy journey smooth and painless. Always available. Shares views and tips. Very much caring and friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Samatha kumar is an excellent gynecologist.  She made me confident about my pregnancy though I had so much difficulty and she is so positive n happy that half of your tension n stress is cured by meeting her.  Highly recommend good very caring very positive and very approachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is an amazing doctor on whole...!!! Shes very friendly and interactive with her patients...she explains the status of your health very nicely nd politely....if one is under her supervisionit means they are in safe hands nd need not worry about anything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are very much satisfied with our consulting doctor her attitude, behaviour and the way she treats her patients which impressed us and helped us take the desicion to deliver our baby there. Dr. Samantha she understands her patients and treats them accordingly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with dr. Samatha .. has been excellent nd smooth.. and i hav high regards for doctors patience , friendliness, explained.. dr. Samatha makes u feel very comfortable..and makes ur pregnancy a happy nd enjoyable one..just want to thank her *** ***** *** **** *******
One of the finest hospital in the city and  pleasant experience with the doctor. Pretty happy consulting birth right. Kudos to the team.
Fully satisfied with hospital, with staff and doctor's . I m so thankful to doctor . my baby born in birth place I m so lucky.
Excellent overall experience with the doctor. Timely feedback and diagnostics.Would highly recommend.
****** ** ******** We are very much satisfied. We would prefer birthplace for rest of the consultations. Hope services would be maintained ever. Wish you all the best...¡!

We felt doctor very friendly and gave us correct guidance. I was taken care well here and was well informed. I would recommend my friends and family to Dr.Samantha mam. Mam is very responsive for all our queries and reachable always.
It is a good experience... The doctor is very nice n friendly... She takes care of every concern of mine. I will be able to tell all my problems openly with her.
Good. Extremely professional. Took time to explain the procedure and the pros and con's. Followed up after the procedure and explained about post procedure care.
Very nice. Excellent atmosphere. Highly patient doctor. Listens to all queries. Very good suggestions. Gives lot of time to patients
It was very good. Very good doctor. She was very friendly. She explained and diagnosed in detail. It was effective...!!

Very patience enough to understand the problem and well reverted on the queries we had!

We appreciate the patience and support.
She is well guided and very friendly.I would like to stay under treatment in future. I find its comfortable all over my consultation.
She is an excellent doctor. Answers all the queries and concerns. Is available anytime of the day on call as well. Very friendly. ☺
My experience is quite good.. She is accessible on phone and I can call her whenever reqd.. She is quite friendly and give room to talk and discuss about the problems...

context: family planning and full contraceptive services,
review: I had a good interaction with Dr Santa. I have developed a confidence. She was quite polite and understood my problem.All my problems were discussed in detail.I am sure it will be a great help for m.
Exceptionally good and the best doctor, we have experienced the best support from the doctor and staff. We would recommend to all our friends and relatives. Thank you
Good...it was overall good experience... Doctor was very good & very polite.I will strongly recommend my family and friends.
Very friendly and accessible doctor.apart from being an expert in her field,she gives a patient hearing to even the smallest of the concerns of the patient.

The experience in the birth place is awesome and we really liked it
We recommend all our friends and relatives to birth place... Thank u
It took around 45 minutes for doctor so mostly if wait time can be improved it would be great.
